metadata.title: Hungry Girl’s Food Personality Quiz
metadata.provenance_note: Paraphrased structure based on a light, food-habits quiz format.

preface: Answer five food-and-shopping questions to reveal your snack-life persona—plus quick pantry tips.

format.display_instructions: Choose one option per question; the letter you pick most determines your result.

questions.text: Open your pantry: what’s the current vibe?

options.label: C
options.text: Bulk buys and frequent impulse deals.

options.label: D
options.text: Cereal aisle and treats are the destination.

questions.text: Pick a soundtrack for your eating habits:

options.label: A
options.text: “Always on the run”—working and snacking on the fly.

options.label: B
options.text: “Clean and bright”—fresh as your crisper drawer.

options.label: D
options.text: Couch, remote, and a faithful streaming queue.

options.label: B
options.text: If it’s not healthy, it’s a no.

outcomes.label: Girl on the Go
outcomes.description: You snack for speed. Stock portable protein and smart convenience options.

outcomes.label: Nutrition Nut
outcomes.description: You shop with purpose. Keep produce prepped and hydration handy.

outcomes.label: Hungry Hoarder
outcomes.description: Overflow alert. Rotate pantry items and plan simple, balanced meals.

outcomes.label: Junk Food Jane
outcomes.description: Treats run the show. Add satisfying fiber/protein swaps to the lineup.

scoring.ties: On ties, pick the description that best fits or combine tips from both.
